name: Sneakers
unsettling_description: Stylish, but they lack traction on muddy, slimy, or bloody surfaces.

name: Work Boots
unsettling_description: Steel-toed to inflict hell on the shins of your enemies.

name: Tundra Boots
original_description: The fuzzy lining keeps your ankles so warm.

name: Thermal Boots
unsettling_description: Keep your feet sweaty enough to be at risk of freezing even with the insulation.
original_description: Designed with extreme weather in mind.

name: Dark Boots
unsettling_description: Matte black leather boots that squish and scream as you walk.

name: Firewalker Boots
unsettling_description: Yeah, "fire" boots. They're covered in monster blood.
original_description: It's said these can withstand the hottest magma.

name: Genie Shoes
unsettling_description: Nothing happens when they are rubbed.
original_description: A curious energy permeates the fabric.

name: Space Boots
original_description: An iridium weave gives them a purple sheen.

name: Cowboy Boots
original_description: It's the height of country fashion.

name: Emily's Magic Boots
original_description: Made with love by Emily. 100% compostable!

name: Leprechaun Shoes
unsettling_description: A little tight on the toes.
original_description: The buckle's made of solid gold.
